entrance.name: Collapsed Entrance
entrance.desc_full:
Cold air. Dust. Broken concrete. A dark tunnel leads north.
*Where am I?*

tunnel1.name: Long Tunnel
tunnel1.desc_full: Metal echoes. Dripping water. Something moves far ahead.

junction1.name: Track Junction
junction1.desc_full: Three paths. Left is darker than night.
junction1.desc_short: Three paths. Left is darker than night.

dark_tunnel.name: Pitch Black Tunnel
dark_tunnel.desc_full: You finally see something. Stains on the walls and as if someone has dragged something heavy on the ground...
dark_tunnel.desc_short: You finally see something. Stains on the walls and as if someone has dragged something heavy on the ground...
dark_tunnel.desc_dark: You can't see anything without light. Something breathes.

storage_dark.name: Maintenance Storage
storage_dark.desc_full: Old tools. Dust. A faint metallic smell.

service_room1.name: Service Room
service_room1.desc_full: Broken lockers. A smashed radio. Silence.

station_a.name: Abandoned Station A
station_a.desc_full: Platform lights flicker. Echo feels delayed.
station_a.desc_short: Platform lights flicker. Echo feels delayed.

station_corridor.name: Station Corridor
station_corridor.desc_full: Old posters. Scratches on walls. Someone passed recently.

locker_room.name: Locker Room
locker_room.desc_full: Rusty lockers. The smell of mold.
locker_room.desc_short: Rusty lockers. The smell of mold.

station_b.name: Station B
station_b.desc_full: Wide platform. A broken train rests silently.
station_b.desc_short: Wide platform. A broken train rests silently.

train_car1.name: Train Car 1
train_car1.desc_full: Seats ripped open. Dark stains on the floor.
train_car1.desc_short: Seats ripped open. Dark stains on the floor.

train_car2.name: Train Car 2
train_car2.desc_full: Cold air. Something scratched on a window: 'DON'T FOLLOW'.
train_car2.desc_short: Cold air. Something scratched on a window: 'DON'T FOLLOW'.

train_car3.name: Train Car 3
train_car3.desc_full: You hear breathing for a second. Then it stops.
train_car3.desc_short: You hear breathing for a second. Then it stops.

maintenance_shaft.name: Maintenance Shaft
maintenance_shaft.desc_full: Narrow path. Water dripping. Rust everywhere.
maintenance_shaft.desc_short: Narrow path. Water dripping. Rust everywhere.

generator_room.name: Generator Room
generator_room.desc_full: The engine is dead. Tools scattered around.
generator_room.desc_short: The engine is dead. Tools scattered around.

power_control.name: Power Control Room
power_control.desc_full: Panels blinking faintly. Something was repaired recently.
power_control.desc_short: Panels blinking faintly. Something was repaired recently.

side_tunnel.name: Side Tunnel
side_tunnel.desc_full: Loose wires. A weak humming noise somewhere far ahead.
side_tunnel.desc_short: Loose wires. A weak humming noise somewhere far ahead.

old_platform.name: Old Platform
old_platform.desc_full: Dusty. Old metro signs. Something ran across the tracks.
old_platform.desc_short: Dusty. Old metro signs. Something ran across the tracks.

escape_tunnel.name: Escape Tunnel
escape_tunnel.desc_full: Fresh air. The exit must be close.
escape_tunnel.desc_short: Fresh air. The exit must be close.
